txt.en: You have come to a cross-roads in Zelem-melek. Your exploration of this large, winding, daunting area will yield many adventures!
MÃ¶gr has asked you to continue your exploration of Zelem-melek to gain a more thorough understanding of this dangerous sector of Moria, beginning with the Wide Halls below.

'I must return to the Twenty-first Hall, but I must ask that you continue your thorough exploration of Zelem-melek. I imagine that you will find many objects of interest lurking in the forgotten halls.\n\n'If you ever return to the Twenty-first Hall, do let me know what you find....'
The Wide Halls are at the bottom of the Great Hall of Durin.\n\nYou should begin your exploration of Zelem-melek in the Wide Halls.

You have begun your exploration of Zelem-melek!

As you explore the maze of this area, you will surely encounter many dangers and adventures.

<rgb=#FF0000>Zelem-melek offers many quests that will unlock as you discover them. Try visiting important landmarks and points of interest to find new quests!</rgb>
The greater passages of Zelem-melek can be found by heading west along the lower hall.\n\nYou should head west from where you planted the banners.
You have begun your exploration of Zelem-melek.
Begin your exploration of Zelem-melek by claiming the Wide Halls ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Head west and begin your exploration of Zelem-melek
